attribute.title: Strength
attribute.affects: melee attack power and speed, carrying capacity, certain athletic actions

attribute.title: Agility
attribute.affects: ranged attack accuracy, dodging, manual dexterity, actions requiring flexibility or speed, initiative rolls

attribute.title: Stamina
attribute.affects: Hit Points, toxin resistance, general health, healing speed, extended physical activity

attribute.title: Presence
attribute.affects: Impact in social interactions, inspiring others

attribute.title: Manipulation
attribute.affects: Guiding conversations, bluffing, persuasion, feinting in combat

attribute.title: Composure
attribute.affects: Willpower, resistance to emotional effects / panic, avoiding distraction, perception

attribute.title: Wits
attribute.affects: Reaction time, improvisation, avoiding surprise, initiative rolls
